overview: Join the Goof Troop gang, Chip â€˜n Dale Rescue Rangers, and a gathering of ghosts for two Boo-dacious escapades that will tickle the daylights out of you.  "Hallow-Weenies" Max and PJ discover a haunted house that's home to a Dixieland band of ghosts who play more pranks than music. When Goofy shows up, things really get wild.  "Ghost of a Chance" Chip 'n Dale are off to London to discover that Merry Old England is Scary Old England when they meet up with a hauntingly funny ghost.
title: Boo Busters
